message_1: Consider a topological space $X$ such that the dimension of its cohomology groups $H^n(X,\mathbb{Z})$ are given as follows: $H^0(X,\mathbb{Z})=\mathbb{Z}$, $H^1(X,\mathbb{Z})=\mathbb{Z}_2$, and $H^2(X,\mathbb{Z})=\mathbb{Z}$. Find the dimensions of the cohomology groups $H^n(X,\mathbb{Z})$ for $n=3,4,5$.
message_2:
